Planet Markup Language Main

2) Add PML
3) Add Planet
4) Select Planet
5) Exit
Selection:
PML:

write.data: {Planet}{Name } 7P9cEN { #Name } { Mass } 0.06870 {#Mass } { Period } 0.66102 { #Period } { Gravity } 0.19786 { #Gravity }{Perihelion} 1.29630 { #Perihelion }{ Aphelion} 0.35795 { #Aphelion } {ERadius } 1.56250 { #ERadius} { Radius } 10.30769{#Radius } { OrbitSpeed}0.21809 { #OrbitSpeed } { Population }2848 { #Population } {#Planet}\n
